mapper.select: select count(*) from uf_maclist_dt1 where use_flag=0
select b.orderno,a.sn,a.mac,a.order_flag from uf_production_order_dt1 a left join uf_production_order b on a.mainid=b.id where b.orderno=#{orderno}
select b.orderno,a.caseno,a.case_num from uf_production_order_dt2 a left join uf_production_order b on a.mainid=b.id where b.orderno=#{orderno}
